name: Fort Of Condor
description:
"Fort Of Condor" is a shooting game created in Game Boy shades.

With 5 different players, 11 different bullets, and 31 different special abilities at your disposal, you can destroy the oncoming robot army!

  • Z: Submit
  • X: Cancel
  • Enter: Pause
  • Tab: Option

* This game is a demo version of an "in-game mini-game" that will be incorporated into the role-playing game "Shoe-strings Story" to be released around 2027.
Please note that since this is a demo version, there is no save function and all data will be lost when the game ends.
